bug.title: Activity is destroyed when taking a picture
bug.body: When using this library on a Samsung Note 3 device (Samsung devices generally) , the device rotates after taking a picture (default device behavior) so it destroys the activity and the resulting image is lost, so if you could add: android:configChanges="orientation|screenSize|keyboardHidden" to the the "MatisseActivity" it would solve this issue. Thanks
